5.caption_en:
A poster titled "PERFORMANCE EFFICIENCY" explaining the pillar's focus on using computing resources efficiently and maintaining that efficiency as demand and technologies evolve. A teal call-to-action button at the bottom links to a "Performance Efficiency Whitepaper."

{
  "artifact_type": "poster/card",
  "title": "PERFORMANCE EFFICIENCY",
  "description": "The Performance Efficiency pillar includes the ability to use computing resources efficiently to meet system requirements, and to maintain that efficiency as demand changes and technologies evolve.",
  "top_icon": "stylized circular gauge/scale icon centered above the title (circle above a vertical line within a rounded rectangle)",
  "cta": {
    "label": "Performance Efficiency Whitepaper",
    "type": "button",
    "position": "bottom",
    "style": "rounded rectangular teal background with white underlined text"
  },
  "layout": "single-column, centered large uppercase title, explanatory paragraph beneath, CTA bar anchored at bottom",
  "colors": {
    "background": "very light gray",
    "title_text": "dark teal/blue",
    "body_text": "dark gray",
    "cta_background": "teal/turquoise",
    "cta_text": "white"
  },
  "font": {
    "title": "bold sans-serif, uppercase, large",

  },

  "notes": "Title repeated and also used in CTA; visual emphasis on performance efficiency pillar."
}
